Hi, does anyone know any software for linux that teaches 10 finger typing?
KTouch

the best way to learn to touch type is to do just this, though: (i) use the correct fingers for the correct keys, (ii) bring your fingers back once you hit each key, (iii) *always* use this method, and never revert despite it being unbelievably slow at first
well yea - but I need to actyually learn which finger goes where ^_^
and finally, (iv) look at the keys all the time at the beginning. Don't worry about typing without looking at the keys -- that comes without you knowing. These points, and you have it.
cool, thanks for those tips :)
